### Visão Geográfica

```{r mapa}

countries <- unique(dummy_db$location) 
countries <- append(countries, c("USA", "UK"))

mapa_mundi <- map_data("world")

ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(data = mapa_mundi, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), 
               fill="#69685C", color = "white") +
  geom_polygon(data = subset(mapa_mundi, region %in% countries), aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), 
               fill = "#8A58E8", color = "#8A58E8") +
  theme_void()
```
